content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=DRS&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=DRS&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>DRS List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=DRS</link>  <description>DRS List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-09-20T19:29:30Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;df323493.1409"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;1589ca13.1409"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;aeda3c10.1409"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;5d4954ba.1408"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;dcecba5a.1406"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;26108c74.1405"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;df323493.1409">   <title>Email Hacked </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;df323493.1409</link>   <description> I just wanted to let you know that I am aware that my email has been hacked. Please immediately delete any suspicious emails you receive from me and hopefully this will be resolved soon.<br>- John    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-20T13:29:27-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>john Turpin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;df323493.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;1589ca13.1409">   <title><No subject> </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;1589ca13.1409</link>   <description> http://sumbertechnetic.com/modules/mod_fxprev/Ale.php    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-20T10:21:45-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>john Turpin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;1589ca13.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;aeda3c10.1409">   <title>Re: Good evening! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;aeda3c10.1409</link>   <description> how are you<br><br>http://thebestiphonecasino.co.uk/gfmpajoo/78455833.htm?27=btkxbp&amp;444&amp;xkblszzj==84708<br><br>john<br>Beetle concluded And in th\ufffd\ufffd space of an hour one might ses closely resembled those And i prayed sh\ufffd\ufffdd rise before sh\ufffd\ufffd hit high timber May reach gimlet butte by ten-thirty    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-17T13:55:17-07:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>john Turpin</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;aeda3c10.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;5d4954ba.1408">   <title>Upcoming Exhibition: Design and Research: Shared Territories </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;5d4954ba.1408</link>   <description> Dear DRS members<br><br>The Design Research Institute at Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University (XJTLU) in Suzhou, China is organising its inaugural exhibition Design and Research: Shared Territories (28 October \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 11 November 2014). The exhibition is curated by academics at XJTLU - Dr Anuradha Chatterjee (Chief Curator), Dr Marian Macken (Curator) and Dr Thomas Fischer (Co-curator and Design Research Institute Director). The exhibition features peer reviewed, mixed media contributions by scholars, academics and designers from Australia, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Finland, United States, United Kingdom, and of course China, from interdisciplinary fields of architecture, urban design, landscape architecture, fine art, industrial design, biological [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-31T05:45:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anuradha Chatterjee</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;5d4954ba.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;dcecba5a.1406">   <title>Openings in Interior Architecture and Environmental Design </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;dcecba5a.1406</link>   <description> Bilkent University, Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture seeks<br>candidates for full-time Assistant Professor positions in the Department<br>of Interior Architecture and Environmental Design, starting Fall 2014.<br>Bilkent University is a private university offering undergraduate and<br>graduate degrees. Instruction is in English.<br><br>Particularly interested in candidates to teach basic design and interior<br>design studios. In addition to the studio course, candidates are expected<br>to teach lecture courses of the curriculum. Candidates should have<br>teaching experience, and their work in design or professional practice<br>should demonstrate creative achievement. Candidates are also expected to<br>have completed their Ph.D and have a potential [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-25T16:44:49+03:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Nilgun Olgunturk</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;dcecba5a.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;26108c74.1405">   <title>Call for online survey participation </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;26108c74.1405</link>   <description> Hi everyone,<br><br>This is a request to complete an online survey to help me with my PhD research project. It is aimed at designers, artists, makers, educators or anyone in the various fields of Art and Design or product creation. I would really appreciate your input. Please find the survey link at: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-23T23:30:08+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Taslima Begum</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=DRS;26108c74.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
